Name: Hatchet
Details: Basic weapon for Axe weapon type. Player will get 1 every time a unit reclasses from a different weapon wielding class to an axe wielding one. Player can sell all extra unequipped Hatchet for extra gold. Weak basic weapon that should be replaced when there is an opportunity.

Name: Shortbow
Details: Basic weapon for Bow weapon type. Player will get 1 every time a unit reclasses from a different weapon wielding class to a bow wielding one. Player can sell all extra unequipped Shortbow for extra gold. Weak basic weapon that should be replaced when there is an opportunity.
